reviews.review: Absolutnie wspaniała. Ciekawa, nieco absurdalna historia singla upstrzona niezwykłymi bohaterami (złośliwość rzeczy martwych nabiera nowego znaczenia), doskonale przemyślany co-op, no i tysiące oryginalnych poziomów społeczności... Lata mijają, a wciąż wygląda dobrze. Klimat superancki. Damn, pewnie powiedziano to już setki razy, ale gra jest doskonała. All hail the Gaben.

Portal 2 is a brilliant sequel to the game that taught us that the cake is a lie. With more humor, more homicidal robots, and a much greater variety of puzzles. Not to mention the new coop mode. It is bigger and better than the original, with more answers, a deeper story, and no annoying challenge modes.
Juegazo en todo aspecto, gráficos, jugabilidad, soundtrack, historia... En mi top 3 definitavemente. Lo mejor de Valve luego de Half-Life.
one of the best games i ever played 69/69

[h1]Short: This game is amazing.[/h1]

Long: it's a game where you get to be a person who can use a hand held teleporter. You get to enjoy a robot getting pecked by a bird (wait, a bird's this far underground?).

Here's a couple of the things I liked the most about it.

[h1]Hillarious.[/h1] Wheatly (one of the main characters, new in Portal 2) is really funny, make sure you stay still long enough to hear his whole dialog. It's totally worth it. So is Glados (sorry, no amazing capitals, I can't remember exactly how the name goes ;) ), another main character whom you'll probably remember from Portal.

[h1]The music is great.[/h1] Alright, for any "hackers" / folder readers - there's no .mp3 files, no .wav's, no audio at all in there. [b]The music is hand [i]coded[/i].[/b] The best part is, the music [b]creates itself[/b] as you go - whoops, got hit by that bomb, let's crank the music up to make it more exciting. Oh boy, nearly at the exit, etc, etc, etc. It's awesome.

[h1]The gameplay makes this worth playing over and over.[/h1] This game has so many new features added on to the ability to use portals to get around. Be it lasers, bounce pads, magic speed increasing gels, it's all awesome. [spoiler](Note: a few features from trailers weren't included such as the pipes that suck things up, or purple/white gel. But there's a bunch of other new things you'll love.) [/spoiler]

[h1]The story is amplified a bunch in this sequel.[/h1] Hmm, the first left you confused at the end? Don't worry - this game answers everything. [i]Portal 2[/i] also has a few new characters that, if I talked about here, I'd ruin the story. But they're awesome and the story adds on to how amazing the game is.

[b]Laugh rating:[/b] 10 / 10. This was really funny, and play [i]Portal 2[/i] the second time to find more funny jokes you missed on the first go.
[b]Music rating:[/b] 10 / 10. Make sure you get the soundtrack (it's free). But you might not recognize the musics in the soundtrack - some are hard to find in the game, and some are in completely different versions (remember, the game makes the music as it goes).
[b]Gameplay rating:[/b] 9 / 10. Like I said - awesome! [spoiler](That 1/10 is left for the lack of a couple features they didn't put in, but it wasn't there for good reasons so.. :P)[/spoiler]
[b]Story rating:[/b] 9 / 10. The new characters make this game so worth playing.

[b]Overall rating:[/b] [big]~95%[/big] Get it! ^_^

Suite du rafraichissant Portal, fondateur d'un tout nouveau genre dans un univers hilarant et décalé, Portal 2 arrive à renouveler d'une manière exponentiellement plus vaste son gameplay, son histoire et son humour. Ces trois éléments sont très habilement dosés pour tenir le joueur en haleine. Son mode coopératif promet, à ceux qui désirent prolonger l'aventure, une parcelle de son univers à part entière. Sa fin est fabuleuse et dévoile timidement en conclusion une excellente maîtrise de l'épique, digne d'une mythologie futuriste. Portal 2 monte sur le panthéon de la réussite incontestable même des allergiques au genre.

一开始没注意到这个游戏，有一天打折时候就顺手买了，steam评分高达90分的游戏， 玩起来很期待，一开始在一个普通的房间被叫醒，一个圆头圆脑的机器人好像是我的朋友，和我说起话来，那语速有够快而且无厘头不知所云（本来就不熟好伐。。。于是很多旁白都没有听）接着就被拉进实验室有了传送枪，对于没有玩过1代的我真的还没理解传送门的意义。其实你需要一个空间转换的头脑，在传送之前你要假想一下从这里传送到那里的结果。不要盲目的传送。接下来增加了方块来按钮，射线，炮塔，凝胶，还有光桥，光柱，跳板等等。同时你还有从高处的重力加速度，斥力凝胶所造成的加速度，在这个游戏里符合动量守恒定律，所以大的冲量进入传送门就可以传送更远，而且有角度之分，想传送更远应该是斜面45度。所以玩好这个游戏你需要好的物理学和空间感！前几关还可以因为你知道从哪里来到哪里去，毕竟有显示出口。到了后几关之后就有一点难了，卡了两三回查的攻略，其实查完了你就会豁然的觉得自己刚才好笨。如果你哪里过不去了有几种可能：1.
你的智商不够用了2.你钻牛角尖了赶紧换个方法吧3.你的眼神不好没有发现关键的线索。。而期这个游戏很讽刺啊！一开始和我很好的圆头圆脑的机器人和我一起打败了所谓的BOSS之后拥有了BOSS的本体变得更加高傲自满，结果背叛了我（真是够了。。我们说好不分离。。）更加讽刺的是被打败的BOSS其实并不坏，和我一起开始复仇。最后把那个高傲的家伙传送到月球了。。之后仿佛是一个梦，我做着电梯离开实验室，以前攻打我的炮塔唱起觞歌来，电梯越升越高，我回到了那个期盼已久普通的世界。蓝蓝的天，一望无际的麦田。我没有了传送枪，也没有实验室和敌人。有一种莫名的悲伤和空虚感。。。之前所发生的永远都回不去了。感谢这个游戏带个我的欢乐和智慧。

What a game. I've heard so much about Portal and Portal 2, and after snagging both in the sale last week I was excited to finally see what all the praise is about.

Portal 2 does an excellent job of continuing and expanding on the revolutionary gameplay of Portal. The traditional portal mechanics find new, innovative applications through the addition of all sorts of new features - lasers, tractor beams, gels, Faith Plates, etc - and the game does a good job of introducing players to these new mechanics while still maintaining a challenging learning curve. After beating the first game in just under three hours, I was very pleased to see that Portal 2 also had much more content in terms of playable levels. It took me about 6 hours to get through the singleplayer story. Coop mode and the Steam Workshop integration will definitely provide hours more of enjoyment.

Visually, this game is stunning. My laptop uses a GeForce GT 750M, and I am able to run Portal 2 very smoothly at near-max settings.

Audially, the music is a welcome addition to the series. The eerie ambience of the first game was a good mood-setter, but I enjoyed the added dynamics that Portal 2 brought with its massive tracklist.

The story was fantastically written, and the humor in the dialogue made each new level entertaining as I solved puzzles while listening to the ramblings of my robot companions.

Overall, Portal 2 is a fantastic game, and is an essential buy for those who already have Portal. Keep an eye out for sales though - they come around more often than you'd think!

Portal 2 corrige les quelques defauts du premier opus. La longueur du jeu est ralongée avec plusieurs séries d'enigmes, le scenario est plus leché que le premier avec une histoire plus complete et toujours une couche d'humour.
Et surtout, l'aparition de plusieurs élements de resolution d'enigmes qui sont, et c'est surement la le point le plus important, savament dosé et agencé pour que l'on puisse trouver la solution des enigmes sans que trop d'etapes differantes soit requise. Ce qui permet de passer d'un puzzle a un autre a un rithme suffisemment rapide sans pour autant etre trop simple.

la durée de vue est immense car il y a la possibilité de créer des tests de toute piece et de profiter de ceux d'autre joueurs.

Dieses Spiel benötigt keine Waffen im klassischen Sinne...

Aufgestattet mit der Portalgun macht man sich auf den Weg und versucht aus den verworrenen Wegen der Firma zu gelangen. Doch hierbei ist Köpfchen gefragt... Wie erreiche ich den anderen Vorsprung? Wie baue ich mir eine Brücke über das elektrisierte Wasser? Wie kann ich den Gegner überlisten?
Spielt man den Singlemodus, bekommt man viel von der Story mit, was nützlich sein kann, wenn man die frechen Sprüche im Coop verstehen möchte.

Der Coop Modus bietet dank der zweiten Portalgun mehr Möglichkeiten, bietet jedoch auch ganz andere Probleme und Hindernisse, die es zu meistern gilt.

Dieses Spiel regt einen dazu an, Lösungen fern der Normalität zu suchen und zu entwickeln.

Hello there,

for my first review I decided talk more about Portal 2. Original intention was to play it with my friend, but after completing a few rooms I began to love this game and went to explore it alone during my free time. 

Now, this game has a tag of "puzzle" on itself, but it wasn't really hard for me. Actually, almost every challenge is completed under the same pattern or, let us say, a way of thinking. Thus sometimes it can get monotonical. Nevertheless, the puzzles are really original, interesting to play in and sometimes even surprising. The other content is unique, the atmosphere is fascinating, great job with the soundtrack. 

Basically, you'll get an approximately 7 hour journey in a huge factory/laboratory that is filled with good/interesting/funny stuff that can be found all around. The only drawback I found was the lack of a choice in this game. For example there could me more ways to complete levels (though I admit that this could make the game even more easy). Or, what would be more interesting, there could a few alternative endings to the game. Or paths leading to the same ending. But this does not make the experience any worse.

Verdict: interesting/unique/intrigueging/easy/a bit too short for it's price tag.

Buy this game of you like linear (but interesting) games with funny/sarcastical plot features.

Şu ana kadar oynadığım en iyi Valve oyunlarından birisi ! Valve'in iyi iş çıkaracağını biliyordum ama gerçekten bu kadarını beklemiyordum. Portal 2, Source motoru ile gerçekten çok performanslı çalıyşıyor. Eğer "Half-Life tarzı" oyunlardan hoşlanıyorsanız ve değişik birşeyler istiyorsanız, geleceğin efsanelerinden biri olan Portal 2'yi satın alıp oynamanızı kesinlikle öneriyorum. Bu kadar güzel, zevkli ve kaliteli oyunlar yaptığınız için Teşekkürler Valve ekibi !
